name: terser
description: JavaScript parser, mangler/compressor and beautifier toolkit for ES6+

scripts.test: npm run prepare --silent && istanbul instrument dist/bundle.min.js > dist/bundle.instrumented.js && node test/run-tests.js
scripts.prepare: rimraf dist/* && rollup -c && cd dist && cross-env TERSER_NO_BUNDLE=1 ../bin/uglifyjs bundle.js -mc --source-map 'content=bundle.js.map,includeSources=true,url=bundle.min.js.map' -o bundle.min.js
